pageContext.claim: “I only wish the public could fully understand how corrupt & dishonest so much of our Lamestream Media is. My Press Conferences are vital. They are reaching millions of people that are not being told the truth, & haven’t been for years (Witch-Hunts, Fake News)!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump objects to probing questions asked by respected journalists simply trying to do their jobs. As demonstrated by this database, Trump says many things at these news conferences which are not true.
